org.spongepowered.api.event

Class SpongeEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.event.SpongeEventFactory

  • public final class SpongeEventFactory
extends Object
    Generates Sponge event implementations.

        T - The type of the state event

                                               Cause cause,
                                               Location block,
                                               BlockSnapshot replacementBlock,
                                               int exp)
        Creates a new BlockBreakEvent.
        Parameters:
        game - The game instance for this GameEvent
        cause - The cause of the event, can be null
        block - The block affected by this event
        replacementBlock - The block that will replace the existing block
        exp - The experience to give, or take for negative values
        Returns:
        A new instance of the event
